comment._content: "A letter from Ronald McNeill, Unionist Member of Parliament for the St. Augustine Division of Kent, to Mrs. Simeon Ford of this city" was published in the NYT on December 5, 1915. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9801E1D81739E233A...
